mjb at nomlang dot org """ Any nom translation script can translate itself to create the same translator in a different language. """

## THE NOM TRANSLATION DOCUMENTATION FOLDER

This folder documents each of the nom translation scripts that are in the /tr/. It also contains other documents about the translation process such as /doc/tr/nom.second.generation.doc.html

I feel that the ease of translation of nom into other languages, and the idea that all nom translators can actually translate themselves and other translators is an important and unique part of the pep/nom system.
